text: Alaqua Cox (born February 13, 1997) is a Native American (Menominee) actress. She landed her breakthrough role – her first ever acting experience – as Maya Lopez / Echo within the Marvel Cinematic Universe in the Disney+ series Hawkeye (2021), continuing as the protagonist in the spin-off series Echo (2024). Category:1997 births Category:21st-century American actors Category:Actors from Wisconsin Category:Deaf people Category:Living people Category:Native American actors
title: Alaqua Cox
